
/// Light version only comes with playback functionality, to bake custom models please upgrade to the full version.

SkinnedMesh Snapshot is a handy little tool to bake a single regular mesh from a animated mesh.

Super easy to use.
Simply select the animated skinned mesh, select move to a frame in the animator, then click the Snap button.

Uses the Unity SkinnedMesh BakeMesh functionality.

- Open the tool in Tools/Mesh Snapshot
- Select folder to save meshes
- Click on the animated object
- Select the frame to bake in the Animator window
- Click Snap to save a baked mesh
